text: right|300px|thumb|Erol Büyükburç (left). Erol Büyükburç (8 August 1936 - 12 March 2015) was a Turkish pop music composer and singer. In 1961, he composed his best known hit Little Lucy. He also wrote the lyrics of this melody.http://www.radikal.com.tr/kultur/hayatini-kaybeden-erol-buyukburc- kimdir-iste-hayat-hikayesi-1311954/ He was born in Adana. Büyükburç was found dead in his home in İstanbul, Turkey. He was 78 years old. He died of a heart attack. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Turkish singers
